verify-subtitle: Socious Wallet partners with Didit for secure identity verification that complies with KYC, AML, and GDPR. No personal data is stored, and a single verification works for multiple services. You decide what information to share, and it is all done in just 1 minute.
verify-submitted: Your verification request has been submitted.
verify-verified: Your identity has been verified. Please remain on this page while your credentials are being generated. If nothing happens after 30 seconds, completely exit and restart the app.
verify-inprogress: Verification in progress. Please wait while we confirm your identity...
